PECIFIC CONFIGURATION:      Pool: USD1/WLFI Uniswap V3      Fee Tier: 1% (10000)      Network: Ethereum Mainnet      Charm Vault: 0x22828Dbf15f5FBa2394Ba7Cf8fA9A96BdB444B71 STRATEGY FEATURES:      \u2705 Smart auto-rebalancing (matches Charm's ratio before deposit)      \u2705 Uniswap V3 integration for swaps (USD1 \u2194 WLFI)      \u2705 Works with existing Charm USD1/WLFI vault      \u2705 Returns unused tokens to vault      \u2705 Comprehensive slippage protection      \u2705 Security: onlyVault modifier + reentrancy guards      \u2705 Accounts for idle tokens (no waste!) FLOW:      1. Receive USD1 + WLFI from EagleOVault      2. Check Charm vault's current ratio (e.g., 20% USD1 / 80% WLFI)      3. Auto-swap tokens to match that exact ratio      4. Deposit matched amounts to Charm      5. Return any unused tokens to vault      6. Receive Charm LP shares (held by strategy, earning fees) SIMPLER than CharmStrategy.sol - NO WETH conversion needed!      This vault uses USD1/WLFI directly (both are vault's native tokens)","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"CharmStrategyUSD1","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"Production-ready
